issue.subject: Stereotype Gemet makes crashing metadata editing form
issue.description:
Since last update of the 4.2.x branche, I have a big crash on editing metadata form. It dosn't crash if I disable the keyword gemet relation : 

 Catchable fatal error: Argument 1 passed to DOMNode::appendChild() must be an instance of DOMNode, null given, called in /home/htdocs/www/tigeo/components/com_easysdi_catalog/libraries/easysdi/FormGenerator.php on line 194 and defined in /home/htdocs/www/tigeo/components/com_easysdi_catalog/libraries/easysdi/FormGenerator.php on line 533

journals.notes: You should set GEMET stereotype on the relation defining keyword to have it working as expected.
I can't set GEMET stereotype on a relation, the stereotype applies to an attribute. Do you mean that GEMET should be listed in the render type option?

Yes, on the relation ending on the attribute with a GEMET stereotype, you have to set a GEMET render type (not stereotype as i said, my mistake sorry).
It is possible that the update SQL files didn't run when you installed the package you built. That could explain why you can't see GEMET render type. This render type is supposed to be added in the database with the 4.2.0-rc-1 installer.
Yes you were right. It's Ok. Thanks.
